Golf clubs

In golf, in order to improve the grip effects, players usually wear golf gloves, often worn on the left hand, right-handed player, the type of players left on the gloves worn on the right hand in the left hand golf clubs, while the female players wore normal left and right.

The emergence of golf gloves is from the United States. Gloves, the part of the golf apparel, a U.S. businessman thought of golfers to play with gloves, and then golf gloves emerged. However, gloves were not initially accepted by golfers, who have always thought that wearing gloves is a superfluous thing, and even affect the feel when playing with the top golf irons.

Golf life

Golf equipment including clubs, balls, shoes, golf caps, gloves, golf sunglasses and clothing.

Here letâ€™s take a deep look at the glove material. Golf gloves are basically three types of material: leather, PU materials, and cloth. The leather is divided into leather: sheep skin, goat, and other skin. Actual production may also take advantage of several materials.
Leather gloves feel good; you can hit the new golf balls, the best feeling grip, is the UK golf shops' choice, the disadvantage is perishable, difficult to manage, but also the most expensive.

Some points to golf beginners

from what rod to get started?
General domestic golf beginners are often recommended for entry to practice as a 7-iron shot from the top golf sets. But golf teaching abroad in general is P (Pitch) wedge shot for the entry.
The importance of the sport is closely related to grip with the impact of the strike hit, but many beginners often overlook this important part. Actually choosing the suitable golf irons is quite indispensable.

Correct ball position is the only way to win good results; full swing golf training aids can help the new starter in the first step. However, some people hit the ball with incorrect posture, sometimes lucky hit get good grades and complacent, thinking that this practice according to a certain right. There is one more thing we should consider is that wearing the suitable golf sweaters and golf fleeces.

The sport spirit of golf

Different from many other sports, golf is mostly the case in the absence of judges carried out under supervision in the golf fairway woods.

Each participant in the campaign to rely on other players take the initiative to consciously abide by the rules and considerate and sometimes you should wear the suitable golf windwear jackets and tops. No matter how intense combat, all players should consciously regulate his conduct when using the golf equipment, at all times show humility and good manners of the sport. This is the essence of golf.

golf balls

Bat
In 1879, a blacksmith manufactured a number of British top golf irons, soon it was used as the game bats. In 1920, an American businessman invented a copper hollow circular control the bat. Till 1924, this bat was designated as an official event with a bat.
Ball
Stoned golf ball was first used. Then switch to leather ball, and later a rubber ball, in a small rubber compression, this is the modern ball or the origin of practice golf balls.

Before the time the ball surface is smooth, but because of the collision and friction pounding the ball on the surface to become uneven, causing some swelling on the skin, people feel this could be uneven, with a protruding lump the ball smoothly but easy to use, This is why the surface of modern golf, with many of the small lumps to be the reason. Nowadays almost each golf-lover got the golf packages and sets.

Golf Cart

The golf cart is also known as electric golf trolleys.Golf cart is designed for golf course design and development of environment-friendly passenger cars.

Golf trolleys can also be used at the resort, villas, garden-style hotels, tourist attractions, etc. Vehicle performance, design novel, safe and comfortable ride from the golf course, villas, hotels, schools to private users, will be your most convenient short-distance transport. While, the golf drivers will be the guidance of your whole round.
